gist.headline: Xenchat enters the chat
gist.blurb: A new fine-tuned chat experience powered by OpenWebUI has bloomed in our ecosystem. Fast responses, fresh vibes.
gist.summary: Added Xenchat, a fine-tuned AI chat interface powered by OpenWebUI and Pollinations, to the community apps showcase.
gist.impact: Users can now discover and access Xenchat directly from our community application list.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the bee discovering a new retro terminal in the garden representing the new chat app. The terminal is cozy and overgrown with vines.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot hovering curiously near a retro computer terminal labeled 'XEN' nestled in a garden. The terminal screen glows lime green (#ecf874) with chat bubbles. Soft pastel gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, chunky sprites.
